This is the space between individual characters in a line of text. +The image below shows the Frequently Asked Questions section on the freeCodeCamp homepage, where this spacing allows you to read each question and answer easily. + + + Micro white space is important because it helps to improve readability and legibility, making it easier for users to scan and understand the content. When designing your web pages, you always want to be mindful of the law of proximity. This law states that elements that are close together are perceived as being related, while elements that are far apart are perceived as being unrelated.
